item.title: 消息人士称，通用大西洋公司计划年底前在阿布扎比设立办事处
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，General Atlantic 计划在年底前开设阿布扎比办事处，并从伦敦调来一名交易员作为新团队的首任成员。【原文：General Atlantic plans to open an Abu Dhabi office by the end of the year and move a dealmaker from London as an inaugural member of the new team, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 9 月商业活动保持稳定；价格压力回升
item.description: 9 月份，美国商业活动保持稳定，但商品和服务的平均价格上涨速度为 6 个月来最快，这可能暗示未来几个月通胀率将回升。【原文：U.S. business activity was steady in September, but average prices charged for goods and services rose at the fastest pace in six months, potentially hinting at a pickup in inflation in the coming months.】

item.title: 高通公司收购英特尔的可能性可能引发反垄断和代工厂的担忧
item.description: 分析师表示，收购英特尔的潜在交易可能会加速高通公司的多元化发展，但将给这家智能手机芯片制造商带来一个亏损的半导体制造部门，它可能难以扭亏为盈或出售该部门。【原文：A potential deal to buy Intel could accelerate Qualcomm's diversification but will burden the smartphone chipmaker with a loss-making semiconductor manufacturing unit that it may struggle to turn around or sell, analysts said.】

item.title: 白宫将制定计划保护美国汽车业，避免第二次 "中国冲击
item.description: 白宫最高经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）计划于周一阐述拜登政府保护美国汽车行业免受其所认为的中国不公平贸易行为影响的广泛方法。【原文：Top White House economic adviser Lael Brainard plans to lay out on Monday the Biden administration's broad approach to safeguarding the U.S. auto sector from what it considers China's unfair trade actions.】

item.title: 零售商名创优品将以 8.93 亿美元收购中国永辉近 30% 的股份
item.description: 家用消费品零售商名创优品周一表示，将以 63 亿元人民币（8.9308 亿美元）的价格收购永辉超市 29.4% 的股份，有望成为这家中国公司最大的单一股东。【原文：MINISO will take up a 29.4% stake in retailer Yonghui Superstores for 6.3 billion yuan ($893.08 million), the household consumer goods retailer said on Monday, on track to becoming the largest single shareholder in the Chinese firm.】

item.title: 米莱领导下的阿根廷美元存款激增 80 亿美元
item.description: 自自由派总统哈维尔-米莱 12 月上任以来，阿根廷的外币存款猛增了约 80 亿美元，这主要是受到一系列有利于市场的紧缩措施和吸引美元重返金融体系的激励措施的推动。【原文：Argentina's foreign currency deposits have jumped by around $8 billion since libertarian President Javier Milei took office in December, driven by a series of pro-market austerity measures and incentives to lure dollars back into the financial system.】

item.title: Tempur Sealy 将剥离 100 多家门店，以完成价值 40 亿美元的 Mattress Firm 交易
item.description: Tempur Sealy 国际公司周一表示，该公司计划出售 100 多家门店，以获得监管部门对其与 Mattress Firm 40 亿美元交易的批准。【原文：Tempur Sealy International said on Monday it plans to sell more than 100 stores in a bid to get regulatory approval for its $4 billion deal with Mattress Firm.】

item.title: Biohaven 的遗传病药物达到主要试验目标
item.description: Biohaven 公司周一表示，该公司对一种主要影响大脑的遗传性疾病患者进行的一项药物评估研究已达到主要目标。【原文：Biohaven has met the main goal in a study evaluating its drug in patients with an inherited disease that mainly affects the brain, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：经济恢复正常的速度快于预期，因此政策也应如此
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周一发表评论称，美国经济已接近正常的通胀率和失业率，美联储也需要货币政策 "正常化"，这表明美联储对未来几个月加快降息步伐持开放态度。【原文：The U.S. economy is close to normal rates of inflation and unemployment and the Federal Reserve needs monetary policy to "normalize" as well, Atlanta Federal Reserve president Raphael Bostic said Monday in comments that suggested openness to a quick pace of interest rate cuts in coming months.】

item.title: 阿联酋在拜登会谈中寻求建立更紧密的人工智能和技术联系，中国的兴趣引发美国担忧
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登将于周一接待阿拉伯联合酋长国总统的来访，届时白宫将就这个海湾国家的人工智能计划举行会谈，这一雄心勃勃的努力也引起了美国地缘政治竞争对手中国的兴趣。【原文：President Joe Biden will host the United Arab Emirates president on Monday for a visit set to include White House talks on the Gulf state's plans for artificial intelligence, an ambitious effort also drawing interest from U.S. geopolitical rival China.】

item.title: 拜登提议禁止中国车辆在美国上路，并通过软件打击来实现这一目标
item.description: 出于国家安全考虑，美国商务部周一提议禁止中国的关键软件和硬件在美国道路上的联网汽车中使用，此举将有效禁止几乎所有中国汽车进入美国市场。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Monday proposed prohibiting key Chinese software and hardware in connected vehicles on American roads due to national security concerns - a move that would effectively bar nearly all Chinese cars from entering the U.S. market.】

item.title: 以色列科技行业具有活力，但在与哈马斯的战争中面临资金不确定性
item.description: 周一的一份政府报告显示，在与巴勒斯坦伊斯兰组织哈马斯长达一年的战争中，以色列的科技行业一直保持着顽强的生命力，但由于它依赖于大公司和外国投资，该行业面临的资金不确定性可能会损害更广泛的经济。【原文：Israel's tech sector has remained resilient during a year-long war with Palestinian Islamist group Hamas but as it relies on large companies and foreign investment, the sector faces funding uncertainty that could harm the broader economy, a government report showed on Monday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官期待工会在紧张谈判中做出重大让步
item.description: 在就工厂关闭和新工资协议举行会谈的前两天，大众汽车公司首席执行官期待工会就如何削减成本和缩小与竞争对手的差距提出建议。【原文：Volkswagen's CEO expects labour unions to make proposals on how to cut costs and close a gap with competitors, two days before talks over plant closures and new wage deals.】

item.title: 比特大陆与 Riot 达成协议，弗里德曼被任命为董事会成员
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆（Bitfarms）周一表示，已与竞争对手和第一大股东Riot Platforms达成和解协议，根据协议，艾米-弗里德曼（Amy Freedman）将被任命为董事会成员。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms said on Monday it had entered into a settlement agreement with rival and top shareholder Riot Platforms , under which Amy Freedman was appointed to its board.】

item.title: 欧洲电动汽车发展停滞不前，Northvolt 将裁员 1600 人
item.description: 作为欧洲电动汽车电池市场的最大希望，Northvolt 公司正努力应对低迷的需求和来自中国的竞争，因此计划在瑞典基地裁员 1600 人，约占其全球员工总数的五分之一。【原文：Northvolt plans to cut 1,600 jobs at its base in Sweden, or about a fifth of its global workforce, as Europe's biggest hope in the electric vehicle battery market struggles with sluggish demand and competition from China.】

item.title: 美国银行将在 2026 年底前开设超过 165 家新分行
item.description: 美国银行周一表示，在与摩根大通争相增设分行之际，该行计划到 2026 年底在美国开设超过 165 家分行。【原文：Bank of America plans to open more than 165 U.S. branches by the end of 2026, the lender said on Monday, as it competes with JPMorgan Chase to add locations.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称降息 50 个基点是 "正确的决定
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周一表示，他支持美国央行最近的降息行动，并称这是一个 "正确的决定"，因为通胀取得了实质性进展，而且失业率有可能上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari on Monday said he supported the U.S. central bank's recent interest rate cut, calling it the "right decision" in light of substantial progress on inflation and the risk of an increase in unemployment.】

item.title: 凯雷支持的 StandardAero 在美国 IPO 的目标估值为 75 亿美元
item.description: 由收购公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）支持的航空服务提供商标准航空（StandardAero）周一表示，该公司正在美国进行首次公开募股，寻求最高 75 亿美元的估值。【原文：Aviation service provider StandardAero, backed by buyout firm Carlyle Group , said on Monday it is seeking a valuation of up to $7.5 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 中国汽车工业协会向政府表达对经销商亏损的担忧
item.description: 中国汽车流通协会（CADA）周一表示，今年前八个月，由于被迫以大幅折扣出售新车，汽车经销商合计亏损 1,380 亿元人民币（195.5 亿美元）。【原文：Car dealers incurred combined losses of 138 billion yuan ($19.55 billion) in the first eight months of the year as they were forced to sell new cars at sizable discounts, the China Automobile Dealers Association (CADA) said on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金在利率下降之际抢购美国科技股，高盛集团称
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份高盛（Goldman Sachs）主要经纪商给客户的说明称，受美联储预期降息 50 个基点的刺激，对冲基金上周以四个月来最快的速度买入了美国科技股和传媒股。【原文：Hedge funds bought U.S. tech and media stocks at the fastest pace in four months last week, said a Goldman Sachs prime brokerage note to clients seen by Reuters on Monday, spurred by the Federal Reserve's anticipated 50-basis point rate cut.】

item.title: 裕信银行通过衍生品进一步收购德国商业银行 11.5%的股份，力争将持股比例提升至 29.9
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）表示，在向监管机构提出申请以达到对这家德国竞争对手 29.9% 的持股比例后，该行已于周一通过金融工具进一步收购了德国商业银行 11.5% 的股份。【原文：UniCredit said it had acquired on Monday, through financial instruments, a further 11.5% of Commerzbank after applying to supervisors to reach a holding of up to 29.9% in the German rival.】

item.title: 关注美联储发言人和经济数据，期价持稳
item.description: 在美联储启动宽松周期数日之后，投资者在等待多位政策制定者的评论和数据，以判断利率前景和经济健康状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Monday, as investors awaited comments from a bunch of policymakers and data to gauge the outlook for interest rates and the economy's health, days after the Federal Reserve commenced its easing cycle.】

item.title: 早间新闻美联储考虑通胀下行，欧洲收缩
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 白宫吹捧 10 亿美元基金帮助汽车供应商为电动汽车重新装备
item.description: 投资公司门罗资本有限责任公司（Monroe Capital LLC）周一表示，随着汽车行业从汽油车向电动车的转变，该公司计划启动一项高达 10 亿美元的新基金，为小型汽车供应商提供贷款。【原文：Investment firm Monroe Capital LLC said on Monday it plans to launch a fresh fund of up to $1 billion to provide loans for smaller auto suppliers as the industry shifts from gasoline-powered to electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美联储降息会让钱装进口袋，但情绪转变可能需要时间
item.description: 甚至在美联储上周批准大幅降息半个百分点之前，金融市场就已经开始为家庭和企业降低信贷成本，因为它们竞相降低抵押贷款利率，削减公司债券收益率，并削减消费者为个人、汽车和其他贷款支付的费用。【原文：Even before the Federal Reserve approved its outsized half-percentage-point interest rate cut last week, financial markets had begun making credit cheaper for households and businesses as they bid down mortgage rates, cut corporate bond yields, and chipped away at what consumers pay for personal, auto and other loans.】

item.title: KKR 为首支北美中型市场交易基金融资 46 亿美元
item.description: 美国私募股权公司 KKR & Co 周一告诉路透社，尽管高利率抑制了投资者对债务驱动型收购的兴趣，导致筹资环境困难重重，但 KKR & Co 已为其专注于北美中型交易的首只基金筹集了 46 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co has raised $4.6 billion for its debut fund focused on mid-sized deals in North America despite a difficult fundraising environment as high interest rates dampened investors' appetite for debt-driven buyouts, the U.S. private equity firm told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行签署收购汇丰银行德国私人银行部门的协议
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas BNPP.PA）周一表示，已签署协议收购汇丰银行（HSBC）在德国的私人银行业务部门。 法国巴黎银行周一表示，该行已签署收购汇丰银行德国私人银行部门的协议，以继续扩大其在财富管理领域的业务范围。【原文：BNP Paribas BNPP.PA has signed a deal to buy HSBC's private banking unit in Germany as it continues to expand its footprint in wealth management, the French lender said on Monday.】

item.title: 德国商业银行股价下跌 3%，德国政府保留股份
item.description: 德国商业银行股价周一下跌 3.1%，此前政府表示将暂时保留其持有的这家德国银行 12% 的股份，此举很可能会搁置与意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的合并。【原文：Shares of Commerzbank traded 3.1% lower on Monday after the government said that it would retain its 12% stake in the German bank for now in a move that will likely keep any merger with Italy's UniCredit on hold.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司因 IT 故障导致西雅图停飞
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）周一表示，该公司经历了一次 IT 故障，对其运营造成了严重干扰，包括航班延误。【原文：Alaska Airlines said on Monday that it experienced an IT outage that caused significant disruption to its operation, including delayed flights.】

item.title: 英国大型投资者准备买入跌势中的美国房地产
item.description: 英国投资管理公司Legal & General和施罗德（Schroders）告诉路透社，它们将向美国的商业地产投资数亿美元，但在很大程度上会避开遭受重创的办公楼领域。【原文：British investment managers Legal & General and Schroders are to invest hundreds of millions of dollars in commercial property in the United States, but are largely steering clear of the hard-hit office sector, the companies told Reuters.】
